abstract: WPP is expected to announce joint venture with music producer Alex Da Kid at Cannes Lions International Festival of Creativity that will create marketing campaigns built around music; venture will be called KidinaKORNERCreate and is part of trend of mixing advertising with entertainment.
lead_paragraph: The new endeavor will create campaigns that connect musical artists to brands, blurring the line between marketing and entertainment.

headline.main: WPP Bets on Music in Marketing Venture with Alex Da Kid
headline.print_headline: WPP Makes Bet on Music in Venture With Producer

snippet: The new endeavor will create campaigns that connect musical artists to brands, blurring the line between marketing and entertainment.
